name: IconDesignLAB.com
tagline: All design services for IT companies since 2005.
description:
Since 2005, IconDesignLAB.com has been solving business problems of IT companies with the help of design. We can help if you need a high-quality website, landing page, interface (UI/IX), icons, logo, splash screen, boxshot, game art design, promotional materials and everything that is displayed on the computer screen.
There are at least 5 reasons to work with us:
In our opinion, design is not just a good-looking picture. We know how to turn graphics into a powerful tool to promote your business and increase sales.
We always finish our work on time.
We donâ€™t take money if the customer is not satisfied.
We specialize in working with IT companies, therefore, we understand all the needs of our customers.
We like all our orders, but especially the design of icons, which we have already created more than 2,000.
